name: Windows CE Dynamic XML GUI
short_description: Dynamicly generated XML-described GUI remote control interface for Windows CE Written in visual C++.  The interface may be used to send UDP control commands other software such as an LIRC daemon generate inferred commands for home entertainment equipment
